name: TroponinLabTest
title: Troponin Lab Test
description: LOINC Value Set Cardiac I, T Yale de novo measure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes for concepts which identify patients who had a lab test for Troponin using a source of blood, serum, or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a blood, serum, plasma lab test performed for a troponin level. Using the Quality Data Model this particular element will map to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Troponin laboratory test using a source of blood, serum, or plasma codes with a reporting scale of mass/volume represented using LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Do not include any codes which do not represent Troponin from any source other than blood, serum or plasma.)

concept.display: Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Detection limit <= 0.01 ng/mL
Troponin T.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Troponin T.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Detection limit <= 5 ng/L

contains.display: Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Detection limit <= 0.01 ng/mL
